insight.text:
• Total Sales is $10,078,819.1 across 12 months.
  • An average of Total Sales across the given range is $839,901.59, with lowest value of $449,277.65 (Sep-2018) and highest value of $1,155,224.85 (Jul-2018) resulting in a difference of $705,947.2.
  • Overall, Total Sales decreased by 55.73% over the span of series from $1,056,978.6 to $467,872.95. It was ended on negative note, decreasing by $30,899.05 from Oct-2018 to Dec-2018.
  • The maximum reduction on percentage basis was observed in Sep-2018 which is 59.35% compared to the previous month.
